name: Brutal Donut
description:
Welcome to Brutal Donut! A new awesome and Brutal puzzle-game.... An ordinary chocolate donut gets loose in the country, is attacked by a vegetable gang and left for dead. Now he wants revenge! Help Brutal Donut explore the different worlds and crush all the veggie scum! A fun & quirky universe, a donut hungry for destruction!
•Pull the donut on the strings to throw him on the veggies!
•Use the bonus for more power!
•But be careful not to hit your friendly pastry.
